subject: docs: fix arithmetic and enhance Model 5 use cases
body:
Technical corrections:
- Fix 5B arithmetic: R1.75M annual payments at 8% (was R1.5M with incorrect total)
- Add 5B note on separating interest from principal for TP/withholding
- Add 5C note on supportable discount rate (Buyer credit risk)
- Soften 5E source code premium claim (was "typically 20-50%")
- Add 5G earnout revenue definition guidance with specific example
- Expand 5G TP consideration re: earnout exceeding expectations

New content:
- Add "Sale Mechanics for All Variants" section covering:
  - What transfers (customers, employees, liabilities, data, infrastructure)
  - TP characterisation risk (sale vs licence recharacterisation)
  - IFRS 15 revenue recognition by variant
- Note 5F and 5H combinability with other variants
- Restructure selection guide into payment/relationship/scope categories
- Add common mistakes for transfer mechanics and characterisation risk
title: fix arithmetic and enhance Model 5 use cases
